item.title: Hopes Fade for Workers Trapped for Days in Tunnel in India
item.description: Local officials have been unable to make contact with eight people after wall of silt and water caused the ceiling to collapse.

item.title: Germany Election Results Maps: How Conservatives Regained Power
item.description: Maps show how every district in Germany voted. The conservative Christian Democrats have won the most seats while the far-right AfD placed second.

item.title: Hamas Official Expresses Reservations About Oct. 7 Attack on Israel
item.description: Mousa Abu Marzouk, the head of Hamas’s foreign relations office, said he would not have supported such an attack on Israel had he known of the devasta...

item.title: Pope Francis, in Critical Condition, Is ‘Resting’ in Hospital, Vatican Says
item.description: Francis is being treated for pneumonia, a complex infection and kidney problems that have left him in critical condition.

item.title: As Trump Courts Putin, China’s Leader Xi Emphasizes Close Ties With Russia
item.description: The Chinese and Russian leaders reaffirmed their relationship in a video call on Monday, an apparent rebuff to the idea that the Trump administration ...
